value: To save the world. I want to invest my time in projects that can make a better place to live for the current and future generations. Either by seeking more efficient and sustainable solutions to actual problems or developing technologies that intend to restore the damage we cause to the environment.

I am a fast learner, many of my programming skills are self-taught. That gives me an edge in time limited problems like hackathons and sprints; I am a team player. Neither handball, business nor competitions can be won alone. I have positive experience being part and leading multidisciplinary teams, reflected in the awards I have been granted.
